Uses of Package
io.oasp.module.security.common.base.accesscontrol

  • Packages that use io.oasp.module.security.common.base.accesscontrol 
    Package Description
    io.oasp.module.security.common.base.accesscontrol  
    io.oasp.module.security.common.impl.accesscontrol  
  • Classes in io.oasp.module.security.common.base.accesscontrol used by io.oasp.module.security.common.base.accesscontrol 
    Class and Description
    AbstractAccessControlBasedAuthenticationProvider
    Deprecated. 
    As of bug-fix release 2.1.2 the authentication mechanism changes. It is now based upon custom implementations of UserDetailsService in combination with WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter. For further information have a look at the sample application.

  • Classes in io.oasp.module.security.common.base.accesscontrol used by io.oasp.module.security.common.impl.accesscontrol 
    Class and Description
    AbstractAccessControlProvider
    This is the abstract base implementation of AccessControlProvider.
    ATTENTION:
    You need to call AbstractAccessControlProvider.initialize(AccessControlSchema) from the derived implementation.
    AccessControlSchemaMapper
    This is the interface to AccessControlSchemaMapper.read(InputStream) and AccessControlSchemaMapper.write(AccessControlSchema, OutputStream) the AccessControlSchema.
    AccessControlSchemaProvider
    This is the interface to load the AccessControlSchema from an arbitrary source.
